history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00547
FULL TITLE : AN ACT TO FURTHER STRENGTHEN THE OFFICE OF THE SOLICITOR GENERAL AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
ABSTRACT : Upgrades the standards, benefits and privileges of the Office of the Solicitor General (SG) and provides for survivorship benefits to the spouse and legitimate children of the deceased or retired SG member.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ESCUDERO, EVELINA G.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Batocabe (060 2017-01-23)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Scheduled for meeting/hearing on 2018-02-07
      2. Approved by the Committee on Appropriations on 2018-02-07
          -Substitute Bill to House Bill Nos. 350, 547, 3275, 4748, 5216 and 5233 was approved with amendment.
MOTHER BILL: HB07376
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2016-07-27
